alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Judith Basin and south central Fergus Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 429 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms 13 miles south of Hobson, or 26 miles southeast of Stanford, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobson, Moore, Danvers, Ackley Lake State Park, Glengarry, Buffalo and Garneill. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 55 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central Montana.
